Player History
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,796,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/5/1985...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/6/1986 to a 4-year deal worth $6,250,000 per year...
Traded from Seattle to Los Angeles on 4/26/1989 (Going to LAD: P Bob James. Going to SEA: 2B Kent Anderson)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Boston on 5/3/1989 (Going to LAD: P Dan Plesac. Going to BOS: P Bob James, 2B Glenn Hubbard)...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/25/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $1,400,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/18/1990, off Mike Timlin (CHC)...
